hero.subtitle: A beautiful, private, and open-source investment tracker. Forked from Wealthfolio to provide a refined, standalone Desktop experience.
hero.platform_support: Always points to the latest release for macOS, Windows, and Linux.

desktop.title: Desktop Focused
desktop.desc: Optimized strictly for macOS and Windows. No mobile compromises.

privacy.title: Local & Private
privacy.desc: Your data stays on your device. No servers, no tracking, complete privacy.

opensource.title: Open Source
opensource.desc: Transparent code. Forked from Wealthfolio, maintained by the community.

footer.disclaimer_text_1: Panorama is proudly a fork of
footer.disclaimer_text_2: . We love what they've built, but we have a different vision for a pure, robust Desktop experience.
footer.disclaimer_text_3: We are not affiliated with Wealthfolio. All credit for the foundation goes to their amazing team.
